item.title: Quest
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:5, topic:281099”][quote author=Dalcian link=topic=371206.msg2804740#msg2804740 date=1243657725]
Idiots, It’s the action button.

13th quest action button is

case 28175: c.q13help(); break;

Depends, do you want some of the npc’s to talk? Or is that already added in another place?

Are you mentally retarded?
[/quote]

thats what my q12 is…[/quote]

Then get the fucking action button?

Go to packet 185 in your client class, and then add this method.

		[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOU CHARACTERS NAME")){
		println("Clicked: " + actionButtonId);
		sM("Clicked: " + actionButtonId);
		}[/code]

Save compile etc.

Then click the quest tab and it will print in cmd the action button, and it will print in chat box.

Then that’s your case number for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Well im trying to add my 13th quest and i was wondering what case it would be in clickingmost.java

case 28164:
c.q1help();
break;
case 28165:
c.q2help();
break;
case 28166:
c.q3help();
break;
case 28168:
c.q4help();
break;
case 28215:
c.q5help();
break;
case 28171:
c.q6help();
break;
case 28170:
c.q7help();
break;
case 28172:
c.q8help();
break;
case 28178:
c.q9help();
break;
case 28173:
c.q10help();
break;
case 28174:
c.q11help();
break;
case 28175:
c.q12help();
break;
